Kimberly Perry Files for Divorce from J.P. Arencibia After Nearly 4 Years of Marriage

After nearly four years of marriage, Kimberly Perry and husband J.P. Arencibia have split.

On Friday, The Band Perry singer, 34, filed for divorce from the former MLB player, 32, in Greeneville, Tennessee, citing irreconcilable differences.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

When reached for comment, a rep for the singer confirmed the news and asked for her privacy at this time.

“Yes it’s true, my marriage has come to an end,” Perry wrote on Instagram Sunday evening. “I know that beauty will come from these ashes and, as always, I want to thank you all for your love and support. I’ll be in touch soon.”

Big Machine Label Group Celebrates The 48th Annual CMA Awards in Nashville - Arrivals J.P. Arencibia and Kimberly Perry | Credit: Michael Loccisano/Getty

Perry and Arencibia first met in February 2012 at the Florida Strawberry Festival, after the baseball player asked shared connections to arrange a meeting. Arencibia then proposed to Perry in October 2013 with a 3.3-carat ring in her parents’ backyard.
